comments.content:
compute/api.py is using opt parse.  I think that this was a misunderstanding of flags.DECLARE() which still exists in nova
This:
flags.DECLARE('consoleauth_topic', 'nova.consoleauth')
means that the consoleauth_topic config opt is defined in nova.consoleauth
